page.title: 14ARMED FORCES AT SANDHEAD
page.content: by Euan Tyson aged 12 Just outside our Domesday Block, but still very near to our school, is a Royal Aircraft Establishment called R.A.E. West Freugh. Luce Bay is used as a bombing and a gunnery range and there are camera posts sighted all round the shores of the bay, one of them being in our block at the north end of the village. Fighter and bomber squadrons from all over the British Isles come to use the range and the noise is sometimes quite frightening - especially when they drop bombs. Over 300 people work at West Freugh, a lot of them from Stranraer and district, which makes " The Freugh " as the locals call it, one of the biggest employers in the district. A few planes are based at The Freugh for equipment trials. There is an Andover, a Buccaneer and a helicopter.
